languages.text: "Ни в коей мере, Лорд-капитан". {n}Во взгляде Абеляра читается невиданный вами раньше холод, однако его голос и выражение лица не выдают ничего, кроме почтения к свое{mf|му|й} влады{mf|ке|чице}.{/n}
"By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ни в коей мере, Лорд-капитан". {n}Во взгляде Абеляра читается невиданный вами раньше холод, однако его голос и выражение лица не выдают ничего, кроме почтения к свое{mf|му|й} влады{mf|ке|чице}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «En absoluto, Lord Capitán». {n}Percibes una frialdad en la mirada de Abelard que no habías visto nunca antes, pero ni su voz ni su expresión muestran otra cosa que deferencia hacia su {mf|señor|señora}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto, Lord Capitán". {n}Percibes una frialdad en la mirada de Abelard que no habías visto nunca antes, pero ni su voz ni su expresión muestran otra cosa que deferencia hacia su {mf|señor|señora}.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「とんでもございません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドの視線から今までに見たことのない冷たさを感じたが、声や表情からは主君に対する敬意しか読み取れない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「とんでもございません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドの視線から今までに見たことのない冷たさを感じたが、声や表情からは主君に対する敬意しか読み取れない。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “绝对没有，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德的目光中流露出了你从未见过的冷漠之意，但他的声音与表情只有对主人的尊敬。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “绝对没有，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德的目光中流露出了你从未见过的冷漠之意，但他的声音与表情只有对主人的尊敬。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pas du tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vous percevez une froideur nouvelle dans le regard d'Abélard, mais sa voix et son expression ne trahissent rien d'autre que sa déférence envers {mf|son seigneur|sa dame}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pas du tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vous percevez une froideur nouvelle dans le regard d'Abélard, mais sa voix et son expression ne trahissent rien d'autre que sa déférence envers {mf|son seigneur|sa dame}.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ganz und gar nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Du bemerkst eine Kälte in Abelards Blick, die du noch nie zuvor gesehen hast. Seine Stimme und seine Miene lassen jedoch nichts anderes erkennen als Ehrerbietung {mf|seinem Lord|seiner Lady} gegenüber.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ganz und gar nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Du bemerkst eine Kälte in Abelards Blick, die du noch nie zuvor gesehen hast. Seine Stimme und seine Miene lassen jedoch nichts anderes erkennen als Ehrerbietung {mf|seinem Lord|seiner Lady} gegenüber.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, ne haddime." {n}Abelard'ın bakışlarında daha evvel hiç görmediğin bir soğukluk dikkatini çekiyor. Ancak sesi ve beden dili, {mf|lorduna|leydisine} hürmetten başka bir duygu yansıtmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By no means, Lord Captain." {n}You detect a coldness in Abelard's gaze that you have never seen before, but his voice and expression betray nothing but deference toward his {mf|lord|lady}.{/n}
